author: Zerowalker
body:
# Steps to reproduce

Set powershell.config.json to something like:

{
"Microsoft.PowerShell:ExecutionPolicy":"RemoteSigned",
"PSModulePath": "C:\\PSModules",
}


# Expected behavior

Powershell should behave like normaly,
but simply have have the added PSModulePath in each new session.

# Actual behavior

Every new launch got it's history cleared.
Meaning Up/Down arrow yields nothing.
Removing the PSModulePath in the powershell.config.json file makes it work like normal again.

# Environment data

PSVersion                      6.2.2
PSEdition                      Core
